item.title: 早间竞标：石油保持平静，中东冲突仍在继续
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: Eurazeo 领投德国人工智能公司 aedifion 2000 万美元融资轮
item.description: 法国私募股权公司Eurazeo周一表示，已牵头为德国以房地产为重点的人工智能技术公司acedifion筹集了1700万欧元（2000万美元）的资金。【原文：French private equity firm Eurazeo has led a 17-million-euro ($20 million) fund-raising round for German property-focused AI tech company aedifion, said the companies on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，UAW 投资失误导致工会损失约 8000 万美元
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的七名 UAW 官员和员工以及工会文件，UAW 领导层因投资失误指控而陷入动荡，官员们称该投资失误使工会从其金融投资组合中损失了约 8000 万美元的潜在收益。【原文：The United Auto Workers’ leadership is mired in turmoil over allegations of an investment blunder that officials say cost the union about $80 million in potential gains from its financial portfolio, according to seven UAW officials and employees and union documents reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 亚马逊推高端美容产品或可抵御特朗普关税
item.description: 亚马逊为即将到来的 "Prime Day "抵御关税？奢侈品。【原文：Amazon's defense against tariffs for its coming Prime Day? Luxury goods.】

item.title: 华尔街期货走高，投资者等待伊朗的报复行动
item.description: 美国股指期货周一微幅上扬，此前油价从早些时候的大幅上涨中回落，投资者正在等待伊朗对美国袭击其核基地做出回应。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged up on Monday after oil prices pulled back from sharp gains earlier with investors awaiting Iran's response to U.S. attacks on its nuclear sites.】

item.title: Snowcap Compute 为超导人工智能芯片融资 2300 万美元
item.description: 致力于利用超导技术制造人工智能计算芯片的初创公司 Snowcap Compute 周一融资 2300 万美元，并表示英特尔公司前首席执行官将加入公司董事会。【原文：Snowcap Compute, a startup working on building artificial intelligence computing chips using superconducting technology, on Monday raised $23 million and said that the former CEO of Intel will join its board.】

item.title: 独家报道美国官员称 DeepSeek 协助中国军方并逃避出口管制
item.description: 一名美国高级官员告诉路透社，人工智能公司 DeepSeek 正在协助中国的军事和情报活动，并补充说，这家中国科技初创公司试图利用东南亚的空壳公司来获取根据美国规定不能运往中国的高端半导体。【原文：AI firm DeepSeek is aiding China's military and intelligence operations, a senior U.S. official told Reuters, adding that the Chinese tech startup sought to use Southeast Asian shell companies to access high-end semiconductors that cannot be shipped to China under U.S. rules.】

item.title: 原油飙升削弱避险吸引力，日元下挫
item.description: 日元通常是地缘政治紧张时期最受追捧的避风港之一，自 6 月 13 日以色列对伊朗核和军事目标发动导弹袭击以来，日元对美元汇率已下跌 2.4%，对瑞士法郎汇率下跌 1.4%。【原文：The Japanese yen, normally one of the most sought after safe havens in times of geopolitical stress, has dropped 2.4% against the U.S. dollar and 1.4% against the Swiss franc since Israel launched missile attacks against Iranian nuclear and military targets on June 13.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 高盛称对冲基金杠杆率达到五年新高，买入银行股
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的数据显示，上周对冲基金的杠杆率创下了五年来的新高，投机者买入了银行、贸易公司和保险公司，此前美国利率保持稳定，而就在美国袭击伊朗核基地之前。【原文：Hedge fund leverage hit a five-year high last week, with speculators buying banks, trading companies and insurance firms, Goldman Sachs data showed, after U.S. interest rates held steady and just before U.S. attacks on Iran's nuclear sites.】

item.title: Prosus 推迟印度支付公司 PayU IPO 以加强业务运营
item.description: 荷兰技术投资者 Prosus 的首席财务官周一表示，该公司不打算在今年将印度数字支付和借贷公司 PayU 上市，重点是在未来 6 到 12 个月内改善业务。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus is not planning to list Indian digital payments and lending firm PayU this year, with the focus on improving the business over the next six to 12 months, its chief financial officer said on Monday.】

item.title: PMI 显示，6 月份法国私营部门活动进一步萎缩
item.description: S&P Global 公司周一称，由于制造业和服务业的疲软打击了欧元区第二大经济体，法国私营部门的活动在 6 月份进一步萎缩。【原文：French private sector activity contracted further in June, as weakness in both the manufacturing and services sectors hit the euro zone's second-biggest economy, S&P Global said on Monday.】

item.title: Prosus 超额完成年度财务目标，年收入达 74 亿美元
item.description: 荷兰科技投资商 Prosus 周一公布，受其在生活方式电子商务领域扩张的推动，全年核心总收益达 74 亿美元，同比增长 47%，超过了其财务目标。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus on Monday reported full-year core headline earnings of $7.4 billion, up 47% year-on-year and exceeding its financial targets, bolstered by its expansion in lifestyle e-commerce.】

item.title: Stellantis 新任首席执行官 Filosa 将继续担任北美区首席执行官一职
item.description: Stellantis 的 Antonio Filosa 周一在担任全球第四大汽车制造商首席执行官的第一天就公布了新的管理团队，并表示他将继续担任北美主要市场的首席执行官。【原文：Stellantis' Antonio Filosa on Monday unveiled a new management team on his first day as CEO for the world's fourth largest carmaker, saying he would retain the role of chief for the key North America market.】

item.title: Naspers 年度利润因电子商务和腾讯的强劲表现而大幅增长
item.description: 南非科技投资商 Naspers 公布，受电子商务业务加速增长、盈利能力提高以及中国腾讯公司（Tencent）贡献的推动，其全年核心利润大幅增长 59.4%。【原文：South African technology investor Naspers posted a 59.4% jump in its full-year core headline earnings, driven by accelerated growth and improved profitability of its e-commerce businesses and contribution from China's Tencent .】

item.title: 中间商如何将非法的中国吸管输送到美国
item.description: 在距离芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场仅 15 分钟车程的一间办公室里，一家小公司仅去年一年就帮助进口了数百万支未经授权的中国产电子烟，成为满足美国对非法电子烟需求的供应链中的关键一环。【原文：From an office a 15-minute drive from Chicago's O'Hare International Airport, one small firm helped import millions of unauthorized Chinese-made vapes last year alone, forming a key link in the supply chain feeding U.S. demand for illegal e-cigarettes.】

item.title: 随着金价飙升，西非矿山运营商启动无人机探测野猫矿工
item.description: 午后的阳光洒在加纳西南部金田公司（Gold Fields）广袤的塔克瓦金矿上，三名男子将一架无人机发射到晴朗的天空中，无人机上的摄像头扫描着这片 210 平方公里郁郁葱葱的土地，寻找入侵者。【原文：As the afternoon sun beats down on Gold Fields' sprawling Tarkwa gold mine in southwestern Ghana, three men launch a drone into the clear sky, its cameras scanning the lush 210-square-kilometer tract for intruders.】

item.title: 市场为伊朗回应美国攻击做好准备，分析师做出反应
item.description: 周一，全球股市下滑，油价短暂触及五个月高点，美元走强，全世界都在屏息凝视伊朗是否会对美国袭击其核基地进行报复。【原文：Global shares slipped on Monday while oil prices briefly hit five-month highs and the dollar firmed as the world held its breath to see if Iran would retaliate against U.S. attacks on its nuclear sites.】

item.title: Holcim 完成北美业务分拆
item.description: Holcim 已经完成了北美业务的分拆，名为 Amrize 的独立业务股票将于周一在苏黎世和纽约开始交易。【原文：Holcim has completed the spin-off of its North American business, with shares in the separate business - called Amrize - set to start trading in Zurich and New York on Monday.】

item.title: 美国攻击伊朗加剧经济不确定性
item.description: 本周伊始，美国轰炸了伊朗的核设施，为通胀和经济活动的前景注入了新的不确定性，本周充斥着新的经济数据和央行官员的评论，包括美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔为期两天的国会证词。【原文：The U.S. bombing of Iran's nuclear sites injected fresh uncertainty into the outlook for inflation and economic activity at the start of a week chock full of new economic data and central banker commentary, including two days of Congressional testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 早间竞标现在球在伊朗脚下
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole】

item.title: 议员表示，参议院共和党人不能强迫美国邮政局废弃电动汽车
item.description: 参议院议员周日晚些时候表示，参议院共和党人不能在一项庞大的税收和预算法案中强迫美国邮政局报废数千辆电动汽车和充电设备。【原文：Senate Republicans cannot force the U.S. Postal Service to scrap thousands of electric vehicles and charging equipment in a massive tax and budget bill, the Senate parliamentarian said late on Sunday.】

item.title: 新西兰 "黄金签证 "计划吸引美国投资者
item.description: 新西兰中右翼政府希望吸引更多的高净值人士来新西兰投资，以刺激经济增长。【原文：New Zealand said on Monday there has been a rush in applications for its new foreign investor migrant visa as the centre-right government looks to lure more high net-worth individuals to the country to stimulate economic growth.】

item.title: 中国 Hellobike 与蚂蚁金服集团和 CATL 成立新的机器人出租车公司
item.description: 中国共享单车平台 Hellobike 周一宣布与蚂蚁金服集团和 CATL 联合成立一家新的机器人出租车公司。【原文：China's bike-sharing platform Hellobike announced on Monday the setup of a new robotaxi firm jointly with Ant Group and CATL .】

item.title: 韩国工业部对美国打击伊朗表示担忧
item.description: 韩国工业部一位副部长周一对美国最近打击伊朗可能对韩国贸易造成的影响表示担忧。【原文：A South Korean vice industry minister expressed concern on Monday over the potential impact on the country's trade from recent U.S. strikes on Iran.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 与债权人达成协议，计划申请破产
item.description: Wolfspeed 周日表示，该公司已与债权人达成重组协议，并计划近期在美国申请破产。【原文：Wolfspeed said on Sunday that it has reached a restructuring agreement with creditors and plans to file for bankruptcy in the U.S. in the near future.】

item.title: 小米将在 6 月 26 日发布会上公布全新 YU7 SUV 的价格
item.description: 小米公司首席执行官雷军周一表示，该公司计划于本周四举行新款 YU7 电动运动型多功能车的正式发布会，届时将公布定价并开始接受订单。【原文：Xiaomi's CEO Lei Jun said on Monday that the firm plans to hold an official launch event for its new YU7 electric sports utility vehicle on Thursday, where it is expected to announce pricing and start taking orders.】

item.title: 美元走强，市场期待伊朗对美国袭击作出回应
item.description: 由于焦虑的投资者寻求安全，美元在周一小幅走强，尽管到目前为止走势并不明显，这表明市场正在等待伊朗对美国袭击其核基地的回应，这些袭击加剧了中东地区的紧张局势。【原文：The U.S. dollar firmed slightly on Monday as anxious investors sought safety, although the moves were muted so far suggesting markets were waiting for Iran's response to U.S. attacks on its nuclear sites that have exacerbated tension in the Middle East.】

item.title: 高盛警告能源供应风险上升，认为油价可能飙升
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）在周日的一份报告中指出，全球能源供应面临越来越大的风险，并对霍尔木兹海峡可能出现的中断表示担忧，这将导致石油和天然气价格大幅飙升。【原文：Goldman Sachs flagged increasing risks to global energy supply and raised concerns over a potential disruption in the Strait of Hormuz, leading to significant spikes in oil and natural gas prices, the bank said in a note dated Sunday.】

item.title: 美国对伊朗的打击导致数千人滞留，航空公司考虑取消中东航班
item.description: 在美国打击伊朗之后，世界各地的商业航空公司周一都在权衡中东航班停飞的时间长短。【原文：Commercial airlines around the world on Monday were weighing how long to suspend Middle East flights after the U.S. struck Iran.】

item.title: 美国打击伊朗关键核设施后，石油价格创五个月新高
item.description: 由于华盛顿周末与以色列联手攻击伊朗核设施的举动激起了对供应的担忧，石油价格周一跃升至一月份以来的最高点。【原文：Oil prices jumped on Monday to their highest since January as Washington's weekend move to join Israel in attacking Iran's nuclear facilities stoked supply worries.】
